div.p: The heirs of Marinos have provided through Theon, his son, for the monthly payment in gold for stathmos of the third indiction one pure gold solidus. Total 1 pure gold solidus. I, Tatianos, have signed. Year 96 = 65, Choiak 11th. Euethios, son of Theodosios --, represented by me, Apphous, has signed.
